name: Artificial Echo
description:
Artificial Echo is a game developed by visual artist Quianna McLaughlin for display at "Transitional Visions", a show at Specialist Gallery in Seattle, WA.

Now, you can bring the experience home.

-

Filled with original work created over the past 3 years, Artificial Echo acts as a virtual gallery experience, allowing you to navigate a dream world inspired by games like Yume Nikki and Ib.
